39278.この土地に <%sL_HOUSE_NAME>を建てます。\nよろしいですか？<y: Build <%sL_HOUSE_NAME> on this land... May I?<yesno><break>

39279.この土地を 購入して 引っ越しますか？\n<yesno 2><break>: Would you like to buy this land and move in?<yesno 2><break>

39280.この土地は <%nL_SELL_PRICE>ゴールドで\n売ることができます。\:
This plot can be sold for <%dL_SELL_PRICE> Gold.
Do you want to sell it?<yesno 2><break>

39281.<color_yellow>\n土地を売ると この土地へのルーラストーン設定が\:
Selling this plot will cause its Zoomstone to disappear. If you have house parts or flower fairies, they will reappear upon repurchase.
If this house is set as a Team House, it will automatically be removed when this plot is sold.
Furthermore, the following will be reset upon selling this land:
House Permissions Slime Chime Messages Baton-chan's Visit Record
Are you really sure you want to sell this plot?

39282.すでに家が建っているため 建てられません。: There is already a house built here.

39283.この土地は <%nL_LAND_PRICE>ゴールドで\n売りに出されているよう:
This plot is currently for sale at a price
of <%dL_LAND_PRICE> Gold.
<bw_break>

39284.この土地に建てる家を お選びください。\n<break>:
Please choose a house to build on this plot.
<break>

39285.<%sL_PC_NICK>は\n<%sL_HOUSE_NAME>を建てた！\n<:
<%sL_PC_NICK> has built the <%sL_HOUSE_NAME>!
By examining the door, you can enter and exit the house, as well as changing its appearance and adjusting other settings.
Once inside, you can rearrange furniture to your liking and access your house storage.
If you'd like to know more about what you can do, use the "Call Manager" command at the door to get an explanation from them.

39286.<color_yellow>\nレンダーヒルズ地区では\n新たに 土地の売却と:
In the Renderhills District, you will now be able to sell your land and move... Also, characters who own land in the Renderhills
region can now remove their adventure books. If you move to My Town, your land in the Renderhills District will be sold for 50
million gold. If you move to any other district, it will be sold for 10 million gold...Are you sure you want to buy this land?

39287.<%sL_PC_NICK>は <%sL_REGION>住宅村\n<%nL_ARE:
<%sL_PC_NICK> now owns Plot <%dL_TOTI_BANGOU>
in <%sL_REGION> Housing, <%sL_DIVISION>,
Block <%dL_AREA>.

39288.この土地は ほかの誰かの所有地のようだ。: This plot already belongs to someone else.

39289.お金を持ちきれないため\nこの土地を 売ることが できませんでした。:
You cannot sell this plot because you cannot
carry any more money.

39290.家が建っている土地は 売ることができません。: A plot with a house built cannot be sold.

39291.<%sL_LAND_SIZE>の土地に\n建てられる家を 持っていなかった。:
You don't have any houses that can be built on
a <%sL_LAND_SIZE> plot.

39292.この土地には 建てられません！\n<bw_break>: You can't build on this plot!<bw_break>

39293.しかし お金が足りなかった。: But you don't have enough money.

39294.現在 この土地は\n売りに出されていないようだ。: This plot is currently not for sale.

39297.レンダーヒルズ地区に 土地を持っているため\nこの土地への 引っ越しは できませ:
You already own a plot in Lender Hills, so you
cannot purchase a plot here.

43976.現在のバージョンでは\n土地の販売は おこなっていません。: Cannot sell land in the current version.

44248.土地は ひとりにつき\n１か所しか 所有できません。\n<bw_break>:
You can only own one plot of land at a time.
<bw_break>

46739.「それでは ステキなハウジングライフを\n お過ごしください！: I hope you have a wonderful housing life!

46740.「それでは ハウジングの楽しみ方について\n 簡単に ご案内いたします！\n<b:
Let's take a quick look at some of the ways you can enjoy your housing! First, let's build your house here! Houses are sold at the
Building Shop in the Housing Village, so you can choose the one you want... Once you've purchased a house, you can build it by
checking the sign... Once the house is built, you can change its appearance... We have a full-time carpenter, so if you want to change
the look of the house, just let us know... You're free to put your own furniture in the house... We'd love to see you try out your
own ideas... And once you've built your house, you can share it with your friends. You can set up access to your house, and
access to your furniture and house parts from your friends and team list... For more information... Once you've built a house,
it's my job to set the permissions, rename the house, change the greeting... If you need any of those things, you can always call me
from the door menu of your house... I'll be waiting...

46741.<%sL_PC_NICK>は この土地専用の\nルーラストーンを 手に入れた！\:
<%sL_PC_NICK> received a Zoomstone
registered to this plot!
<me 60><end>

46742.「<%sL_PC_NICK>さま！\n 土地のご購入 おめでとうございます！\n:
Ms.Mr. <%sL_PC_NICK>! Congratulations on your land purchase.
My name is <%sL_MAID_NAME>, and I'm in charge of this residential district. It's very nice to meet you.
As a commemoration of becoming a new land owner, I want to give you this Zoomstone registered to your land.
However, this Zoomstone is different in that it cannot be rewritten. It is meant specifically to return to your home.

50219.この土地に引っ越して 本当によろしいですか？\n<yesno 2><break>:
Are you sure you want to move to this plot of
land?
<yesno 2><break>

50220.今 所有している家を\nこの土地に 移動しますか？\n<yesno><break:
Would you like to move the house you
currently own to this plot?
<yesno><break>

50221.<%sL_PC_NICK>は 新しい土地を購入し\nこの土地に 引っ越した！\n:
<%sL_PC_NICK> has purchased a new plot of land and has moved to this location! The Zoomstone for his house is automatically
rewritten to this location... The house that stood on the previous plot of land has reverted back to House Kit.If you have furniture that was in your old house before you moved, it will be in a special state of evacuation, and when you
build your new house, you will be able to place it under "Furniture in Place" in the door menu... If I've hired a private
concierge, will I be able to go to "Concierge Settings" after I've moved to a new home and tell them where to...

50222.家の中の家具は 一度 すべて\n片づけられますが 『配置中の家具』から\nふたた:
You can put all the furniture in your house away once, but you can put it back in again from the "furniture in place"... Also, some
exterior features, like fences and grounds, are specific to each lot size, so they won't work on different sized lots...

50223.引っ越し先の家に 家具が入りきりません！\n家具を片づけてから 引っ越ししてくだ:
I can't fit all my furniture in the house I'm
moving into! You'll have to pack up your
furniture before you can move in...<bw_break>

51864.新しい土地を買うと 引っ越しができます。\n前に所有していた土地は その土地に準:
If you buy a new place, you'll have to move... Previously owned land is sold for the same price as the land...If you're moving to a different size lot, you'll need a house kit big enough to fit on that lot!When you move to a new house, the house will be returned to the house kit... The furniture that was placed in the house before the move
is in a special state of evacuation, and when the new house is built, it can be placed in the "Furniture in Place" menu in the door
menu... If I've hired a private concierge, will I need to go to "Concierge Settings" and tell them where to go again after I move? If
the size of the house on the previous lot is less than the size of the new lot, you can move in... You can keep your house kit and
your garden furniture. If your house was set up as a Team Gathering Place before you moved in, it will automatically be unset up as a
Gathering Place when you move out. Zoomstone jumps will automatically change to the new location...

51891.この住宅村には 現在 全部で<%nL_WELCOME_NUM>軒の\nウェルカム:
There are currently a total of <%nL_WELCOME_NUM> welcome houses in this residential village... Would you like to
visit the welcome house in this residential village?

52072.前に所有していた土地は\n<%nL_SELL_PRICE>ゴールドで 売却されま:
My previous property was sold for
<%nL_SELL_PRICE> gold... Are you sure you
want to move to this land?<yesno 2><break>

52073.前に所有していた土地は\n<%nL_SELL_PRICE>ゴールドで 売却されま:
My previous property was sold for
<%nL_SELL_PRICE> gold...

52099.『他の人の家へ』を使えば この大陸の住宅村で\nウェルカムハウス設定にしている誰:
With "Visit Other People's Homes," you can jump in front of anyone's house that's set up as a welcome home in any residential village
on this continent! However, you'll never know which house you're going to... The location you go to will change every time, so try it
again and again to visit different houses...

52155.持ちものが いっぱいのため\n引っ越し できませんでした。\n<br>\n引っ越:
I can't move because I have too many things... We can't move unless there's room in the inventory for a house kit. Please try
again when you have more space...

52718.現在 引っ越しをすることが できません。\n時間を置いて もう一度 お試しくださ:
We're moving now, so... Please give it some
time and try again...

56355.家の中か お庭に 人がいるため\n引っ越すことが できません。\n人がいない時に:
I can't move out because there are people in
my house or in my yard... Please try again
when there's no one around...

62360.この土地には 建てられません！\n正しいサイズの家キットを 選択してください。\:
You can't build on this lot! You must select
the correct size house kit...<bw_break>

65196.畑で栽培中は 引っ越しできません！\n<br><color_yellow>\nま:
You can't move while it's growing in the field!You can also move if there's a fish in the sewers, or if there's a fellow monster in the garden, or if you're on a walkabout, or if
you have a gift to give away...

68360.ルーラストーンの記憶場所を\n<%sM_item1><%sM_rurastone:
Change this Zoomstone's location from
<%sM_item1><%sM_rurastone1><%sM_dot1><%sM_sub1>
to <%sL_OwnerName>'s home?
<yesno><break>

68361.どの ルーラストーンに\nこの場所を 記憶させますか？\n<break>: Register this location in which Zoomstone?<break>

68362.ルーラストーンの記憶する場所が\n<%sL_OwnerName>の家になりました:
<%sL_OwnerName>'s home was registered
to the Zoomstone.

68363.それは 記憶された場所を\n変えることが できません。\n別の石を 選んでくださ:
This stone's location cannot be changed.
Please choose a different one.<break>

68412.すでに この場所を記憶させた\nルーラストーンを 持っています。:
You already have a Zoomstone registered to
this location.

76093.お招きのつばさは ひとつ <%nL_GOLD>ゴールドで\n１０回 使えます。購:
An Invitation Wing costs <%dL_GOLD> Gold
and can be used 10 times. Would you like
to purchase one?
<yesno><break>

76094.お招きのつばさを 購入しました！\n <se System 7><end>: You bought an Invitation Wing!<se System 7><end>

76095.つかうものが いっぱいで\n購入できませんでした。\n<end>: I'm afraid I have too many things to buy.<end>

78772.お招きのつばさは ルーラストーンのように\n<%sL_OWNER>の家まで 移動:
The Wings of Invitation, like the Zoomstones, allow you to travel to the home of <%sL_OWNER>... You can purchase one from the
caretaker of the house or from a sign in the house for 500 gold. You can use it 10 times... You can give them to others, but you
can't give them to the bazaar. If you move after you've purchased the Wings of Invitation, you'll need to move to your new
home...

79173.不明なエラーにより\n処理を終了できませんでした。:
The process cannot be terminated due to an
unknown error...

81414.仲間モンスターが お庭にいるか\nおさんぽ中なので 引っ越しできません。\n<b:
I'm not sure if my monsters are in the garden or if they're just out for a walk, so I can't move them...When you get a gift from a fellow monster, or when you're growing a field, or when there's a fish in the water under the floor, you can
move...

81415.仲間モンスターからの おくりものが\nお庭にあるときは 引っ越しや\n土地の売却:
When the gifts from your fellow monsters are in your garden, you can't move or sell your land...There are also monsters in your garden, or you're out for a walk, or there's a fish in the water, or you're growing a field and you
can't move...

82691.<%sL_ITEM>を 持っているため\n使用すると タダで土地を手に入れられま:
You have <%sL_ITEM>, which means you can use
it to get free land... Do you use <%sL_ITEM>?<yesno 2><break>

82699.この土地は <%nL_LAND_PRICE>ゴールドで\n売りに出されているよう:
This land is listed for sale at
<%nL_LAND_PRICE> Gold... Would you like to
purchase this land?<yesno 2><break>

82700.この土地は <%nL_LAND_PRICE>ゴールドで\n売りに出されているよう:
This land is being offered for sale at
<%nL_LAND_PRICE> gold... Are you sure you
want to move to this land?<yesno 2><break>

86552.この家を チーム集会所に設定しますか？\n<yesno 2><break>:
Set this house as your Team House?
<yesno 2><break>

86553.この家を チーム集会所ではなくしますか？\n<yesno 2><break>:
Do you want to remove this house as the
Team House?
<yesno 2><break>

89602.さかなが 床下水そうにいるときは\n引っ越しできません。\n<br><color:
You can't move when the fish are in the subfloor...You can also move when you're growing a field, or when your monsters are in the garden, or when you're out for a walk, or
when you have a gift to give away...

112817.前に所有していた土地は\n<%nL_SELL_PRICE>ゴールドで 売却されま:
My previous land holdings were sold for <%nL_SELL_PRICE> gold... I'm currently maxed out, so any gold I can't keep will be lost,
is that okay with you?

117405.ただいま 引っ越しの作業中です。\n完了するまで お待ちください。:
We're in the process of moving... Please wait
until it's done...

122514.プライベートコンシェルジュが いるため\n土地の売却が できません。:
We have a private concierge who can help you
sell your land...

127314.<pc>が 持っている\n幸せのご近所バトンが 輝きだした！\n<br>\nこの:
's Happy Neighborhood Baton began to shine!
Pass on the baton to this house's owner, <%sL_OWNER>?

127315.<pc>が 持っている\n幸せのご近所バトンが 輝きだした！\n<br>\n幸せ:
's Happy Neighborhood Baton began to shine!
Pass on the baton to this plot?

127316.<pc>は 幸せのご近所バトンを\nこの家の住人 <%sL_OWNER>さんに:
<pc> passed on the baton to
<%sL_OWNER>! Go back and speak
with <%sM_NpcName>!
<me 60><end>

127317.<pc>は 想いを込めて\n幸せのご近所バトンを この土地に置いた！\n戻って:
<pc> passed on the baton to this plot!
Go back and speak with <%sM_NpcName>!
<me 60><end>

129139.まだ 幸せのご近所バトンは\nまわされている 途中のようだ。\nもうしばらく 待:
The neighborhood baton of happiness is still
being passed around, and it's on its way.
Let's wait a little longer!

131761.現在 新しい土地へ 引っ越し中です。\nすこし 時間がかかることもありますが\n:
We're moving to a new place... It may take
some time, but please wait a while...<break>

131763.「こんにちは <%sL_PC_NICK>さま。\n レンダーヒルズに ようこそい:
Hello, <%sL_PC_NICK... Welcome to Render Hills... Your move is complete... My name is <%sL_MAID_NAME> and I am the administrator of
this residential village... I look forward to working with you... We will do our best to make your stay with us as comfortable as
possible. returned to the house kit...If you have furniture that was in your old house before you moved, it will be in a special state of evacuation, and when you
build your new house, you will be able to place it under "Furniture in Place" in the door menu... If I've hired a private
concierge, will I be able to go to "Concierge Settings" after I've moved to a new home and tell them where to...Now, you, <%sL_PC_NICK>, will be living in Renderhills... I hope you enjoy your time here!

132254.「はじめまして <%sL_PC_NICK>さま。\n 土地のご購入 おめでとうご:
Nice to meet you <%sL_PC_NICK... Congratulations on your land purchase! I'm sure you'll be very happy with the way we're
going to help you live your life... My name is <%sL_MAID_NAME>, and I am the manager of this residential village... I look forward to
working with you... As proof that you, <%sL_PC_NICK>, are now a landowner, I would like to present you with a rune stone to this
location. This rune stone is unlike any other... in that it can be rewritten to remember... It's a special gift for your
return... Now, you will be living in Renderhills... I hope you enjoy your stay here!

132306.<%sL_PC_NICK>は この土地専用の\nルーラストーンを 手に入れた！\:
<%sL_PC_NICK> received a Zoomstone
registered to this plot!<me 72><end>

133411.まだ 幸せのご近所バトンは\nまわされている 途中のようだ。\nもうしばらく 待:
The neighborhood baton of happiness is still
being passed around, and it's on its way.
Let's wait a little longer!

135678.幸せのご近所バトンを \n届けることが できませんでした。\nすこし時間をおいて:
Couldn't pass on the baton. Please try again
later.

145587.この家が すぐに引っ越しできる状態か\n引っ越しチェックで 確認しますか？\n<:
Do a move in check to see if this house is
ready to be moved into?
<yesno><break>

145588.以上が 引っ越しチェックとなります。\n満たしていない項目があると\n引っ越しで:
Moving check has finished. If you do not meet
any of these requirements, you will not be
able to move out.

145589.畑に 作物が植えられています。\n収穫するか 『やりなおす』にて\n畑に何も植え:
Your field is currently planted with seeds.
Either harvest the plants or use "Replant"
to clear the field out.
<bw_break>

145590.すべての条件を 満たしています。\nいつでも 引っ越しできる状態です。:
If you meet all the requirements... I'm ready
to move out at any time...

145591.モンスターのおうちに 仲間モンスターがいます。\n仲間モンスターを おうちから\:
There is a fellow monster in your monster
house. Please withdraw the fellow monster
from the house.
<bw_break>

145592.引っ越しチェックを使えば いつでも\nこの家が 引っ越しできる状態か\n確認する:
With the moving check, you can check to see if your house is ready to move at any time... You can't move if there are crops in the
field, fish in the water, people in the house, or monsters in the house... If you want to move, please do this moving check
before you move to make sure you meet all the conditions...

145593.床下水そうに さかながいます。\n床下水そうから すべてのさかなを出して\nから:
There are fish currently in your floor tank.
Please remove all of the fish.
<bw_break>

146565.現在 家の中か 庭に人がいるようです。\n誰かがいると 引っ越しできませんので\:
Now, there are people in the house and in the yard... I can't move in if there's someone in the house, so please make sure there's no one
in the house or in the yard...

148088.レンダーヒルズ地区では\n土地の売却と マイタウン以外への\n引っ越しはできませ:
In the Renderhills area, you can't sell your
land and move outside of My Town...

160912.この土地は 現在 購入禁止時間が\n設けられているため 購入することができません:
This land is currently under a no-purchase
policy, so you cannot purchase it... Please
wait a moment and try again...

170343.どなたかが この土地で作業中のため\n土地を購入することが できませんでした。:
We are unable to purchase the land because
someone is working on this property...

170344.どなたかが この土地で作業中のため\n引っ越しすることが できませんでした。:
We can't move in because someone's working on
the property...

170345.どなたかが この土地で作業中のため\n土地を売却することが できませんでした。:
We can't sell the land because someone's
working on it...

170346.土地を購入することが できませんでした。\n時間を置いて もう一度 お試しくださ:
I am unable to purchase the land... Please
give it some time and try again...

170347.引っ越しすることが できませんでした。\n時間を置いて もう一度 お試しください:
I can't get it to move... Please give it some
time and try again...

170348.土地を売却することが できませんでした。\n時間を置いて もう一度 お試しくださ:
I can't sell the land... Please give it some
time and try again...

189107.<pc>が 持っている\nサンタのふくろが 輝きだした！\n<br>\nこの家の:
The Santa's sack that <%sL_OWNER> has started to glow! Would you like to deliver a Christmas present to the inhabitant of this
house, <%sL_OWNER>?

189108.<pc>が 持っている\nサンタのふくろが 輝きだした！\n<br>\nクリスマ:
<pc> The Santa Claus' sack just started to glow!
Would you like to bring a Christmas present
to this land?<yesno><break>

189109.<pc>は クリスマスプレゼントを\nこの家の住人 <%sL_OWNER>さんに:
<%sM_NpcName> has delivered a Christmas present to the occupant of this house, <%sL_OWNER>! Let's go back and report to
<%sM_NpcName>!

189110.<pc>は 想いを込めて\nクリスマスプレゼントを この土地に置いた！\n戻って:
<pc> has placed a thoughtful Christmas gift on
this land! Let's go back and report to
<%sM_NpcName>!<me 60><end>

230840.元の土地に 家が建っている場合\n家キットや 配置している家具庭具も そのままで:
If there's a house on the original lot, do you want to move in with the house kit and all the furniture and garden equipment in
place? Move in as is Moving to a vacant lot stop

230842.<%sL_PC_NICK>は 新しい土地を購入し\nこの土地に 引っ越した！\n:
<%sL_PC_NICK> has purchased a new plot of land and has moved to this location! The Zoomstones for his house are automatically
rewritten to this location...

230844.引っ越し先の土地のサイズが\n家キットより小さいので\nそのまま 引っ越すことが:
The size of the lot we're moving into is
smaller than the house kit, so we can move
right into...

233002.土地を 購入できませんでした。\n現在のプレイ環境では 最安値になっている\nＳ:
I'm unable to purchase land... You can only
purchase S-size lands, which are the lowest
priced in the current playing environment...

238661.「こんにちは <%sL_PC_NICK>さま。\n レンダーヒルズに ようこそい:
Hello, <%sL_PC_NICK... Welcome to Render Hills... Your move is complete... My name is <%sL_MAID_NAME> and I am the administrator of
this residential village... I look forward to working with you... We will do our best to make your stay with us as comfortable as
possible. If you've hired a private concierge, after you move in, you'll need to go to your concierge settings and re-direct them...Now, you, <%sL_PC_NICK>, will be living in Renderhills... I hope you enjoy your time here!

246752.更地に 庭具があるため\n家を 建てられません。\n庭具を撤去して 家を建ててく:
You can't build a house on a vacant lot with
garden tools... I'd like to remove the garden
tools and build a house...

246755.この土地を 本宅に設定しました。\n<br>\n元の本宅は 別宅になりましたので:
This property is now the main residence... Now that the original home has been turned into an annexe, the Ruler's Stone will be
recorded on the property that became the main residence.

246756.この土地を 『本宅』に 設定しますか？\n<color_yellow>ウェルカム:
Would you like to make this property your
"main residence"?<color_yellow>If your welcome setting is set to
MormonBazaar, your welcome setting will be
removed...<color_white>

<select_se_off>
counter for ships, octopuses and squid
no
<select_end>

246757.マイタウンの中で 拠点の住まいとなる\n『本宅』を 設定することで 施設のひとび:
In My Town, you'll be able to set up your main residence, which will be your base, and you'll be able to move the people in the
facility around and place garden tools...

246758.『本宅』を 設定することで 施設のひとびとの\n移動や 庭具の配置が できるよう:
By setting up a main house, you'll be able to move the people in the facility around and place garden tools... Set up one of the lots
as your main residence...

246759.この土地を 『本宅』に 設定しました。:
I'm going to set up this property as my main
residence...

246761.本当に 住宅村の家から マイタウンの\nこの家に 住所を移して 引っ越ししますか:
Are you sure you want to move from a house in
a residential village to this house in My
Town, moving your address?<yesno 2>
<break>

246769.「<%sL_PC_NICK>さま！\n マイタウンのご購入 おめでとうございます:
<%sL_PC_NICK> Sir! Congratulations on your purchase of My Town! My name is <%sL_MAID_NAME> and I'm the manager of this
Mytown... I'd like to thank you for your continued support... As proof that you, <%sL_PC_NICK>, are now a landowner, I would
like to present you with a rune stone to this location... This rune stone is unlike any other... in that it can be rewritten to
remember... It's a special edition for your return...

246850.今は 他の家を\n本宅に 設定できません。\n時間を置いてから 再度 お試しくだ:
Right now, I can't set the other house as the
main residence. Please give it some time and
try again.

246851.なんらかの 問題が起きたため\n設定が できません。\n時間を置いてから 再度:
I'm afraid there's been some sort of problem
with the settings. Please give it some time
and try again...

247540.マイタウンでは\n土地の売却と 他の土地への\n引っ越しはできません。:
In My Town, you can sell your land and move
to another property...

247541.マイタウンを ご購入の際も\n『土地管理人リステア』から\nご案内が ありました:
And when you buy My Town
From "Listeria, the Land Manager"
As you were informed
<color_yellow>Please note that once you've moved to My
Town, you can no longer move to the Housing
Village...<color_white>You can't move to a residential village, but
do you really want to make this your home?<yesno 2>
<break>

247542.「それでは ステキなマイタウンライフを\n お過ごしください！: Then, have a wonderful life in My Town!

247543.「それでは マイタウンの楽しみ方について\n 簡単に ご案内いたします！\n<b:
Let's take a quick look at how you can enjoy My Town! First, let's build your house here! Houses are sold at housing stores, so you can
choose one there... Once you've purchased your house, you can build it here by checking the sign... Once you've built your home, you
can change its appearance... We have a full- time carpenter on staff, so if you'd like to change your mind, just ask... In My Town, you
can place furniture inside your home and garden tools on any lot outside your home... You can even share the placement and cleanup
of furniture and garden tools with your friends by setting permissions... You can set permissions to enter, leave, and interact
with your town from your friends or team list... You and your friends can share permissions to arrange your entire MyTown...
For more information... Once you've built your home, it's my job to set up your home and My Town permissions, change your name,
change your greetings... If you need any of these things, please feel free to call me from the door menu of your house... I'll be
waiting...

247555.番地の敷地に 庭具があるため\n新しく家を建てたり 家の建て替えができません。\:
There's a garden tool on the third lot, so we can't build a new house or rebuild the house... I'd like you to remove the garden
tools before you try...

247693.レンダーヒルズ地区では\n新たに 土地の売却と 引っ越しが\nできるようになりま:
In the Render Hills area, you can now sell
your land and move...<color_yellow>If you move to My Town, your land in the
Renderhills district will be sold for 50
million gold...<color_yellow>If you move to another district, it will be
sold for 10 million gold...<color_white>Would you like a move-in check to make sure
this house is ready to move into?<yesno><break>

247694.すべての条件を 満たしています。\nいつでも 引っ越しできる状態です。:
If you meet all the requirements... I'm ready
to move out at any time...

247717.「こんにちは <%sL_PC_NICK>さま。\n マイタウンのご購入 おめでと:
Hello <%sL_PC_NICK... Congratulations on your purchase of My Town... Your move is now complete... My name is <%sL_MAID_NAME> and
I'm the administrator of Mytown... I would like to thank you for your continued support... From now on, we will help you live
your life to the fullest, and I'm sure you'll be very satisfied... location... The house that stood on the previous lot has been returned to the house kit...Any furniture that was placed in your home before you moved will be placed in a special evacuation state and can be repositioned from
the "Furniture in Place" menu on your home's door... If I have a private concierge, will I be able to go to the "Concierge Settings"
section of my home's door menu and instruct them where to...Now, you, <%sL_PC_NICK>, are the proud owner of My Town... I hope you enjoy your life here!

247718.マイタウンの土地への 引っ越しを確認します\n前に所有していた土地は\n<%nL:
We'll confirm that you're moving to a property in My Town, and that your previous property will be sold for <%nL_SELL_PRICE>
gold... Also, if your house was set up as a Team Gathering Place before you moved in, it will automatically be unset up as a Gathering
Place when you move out...If you've set up a welcome house, you'll have to reset it... Baton-chan is coming to My Town... If you haven't received a gift yet,
please do so before you move...The destination of your Zoomstone will automatically change to the number of your land in My Town, and the land you move to
will become your home. Also, some of the exterior features, like fences and grounds, are unique to each land size, so you can't
use them on different sized land...

247725.番地の 敷地内に 庭具があるため\n新しく家を建てたり 家の建て替えができません:
Because the garden tools are on the numbered lot, it is not possible to build a new home or rebuild a home... Please move the garden
tools off the lot or put them away before you try...

247726.番地の 敷地内に\nプライベートコンシェルジュがいるため\n新しく家を建てたり:
The presence of a private concierge on the grounds of the numbered lot allows for the construction of a new home or the rebuilding
of a home... You can either move the private concierge off the lot, or you can say goodbye and try...

247885.レンダーヒルズ地区に 土地を持っているため\n土地を売却できません。:
I have land in the Render Hills area that I
could sell for...

247989.マイタウンに 土地を持っているため\nこの土地への 引っ越しは できません。:
I own land in My Town, so I can't move to
this property...

248112.番地の 敷地内に 施設の人がいるため\n新しく家を建てたり 家の建て替えができま:
We can't build a new house or rebuild a house because there's an institutionalized person on the numbered property... We'll have to
move them off the property before we can try...

248278.番地の敷地内に 人がいるため\n新しく家を建てたり 家の建て替えができません。\:
We can't build a new house or rebuild a house because there are people on the property at number... We'll call out to the people on the
property at number two, ask them to come outside the property, and then we'll try...

251551.今 本宅の ウェルカム設定が\n『モーモンバザー』になっているので\nここを 本:
Now, the welcome setting at the main house is
set to "Mormon Bazaar," so if we could set
this as the main house...

253435.ウェルカム設定の モーモンバザーが\n解除されました。:
The Mormon bazaar in the welcome setting has
been deactivated...

255237.マイタウンから 引っ越しても\nマイタウン権利証は なくなりません。\n<br>:
If you move out of My Town, you no longer have a My Town Bill of Rights... However, you will no longer be able to enter My Town...
I've set up separate permissions for my house and MyTown... for touching, writing on the slime chime, using the bed, and the
concierge's daily routine. You'll need to go to the administrator menu and set your permissions... Also, if you move out of My
Town, you won't be able to return to My Town for three days...

255238.本宅と その中に配置されていた家具を\nそのまま引っ越ししますか？\n<sele:
Would you like to move out of the main house
and all the furniture that was in it?
<select_se_off>
Move out of the main house as it is
Moving to a vacant lot
stop
<select_end><break>

255240.『更地に引っ越し』の場合 建っていた家は\n本宅 別宅ともに 家キットに戻ります:
If you're moving to a new house, the existing house will be returned to the house kit... The furniture that was placed in the main
house before the move is in a special state of evacuation, and when I build a new house, I can place it in the "Furniture in progress"
menu in the door menu... All furniture placed in another house and garden equipment placed in My Town will be stored in the storage
room. The replica furniture that was placed in my other house and the replica garden tools that were placed in my town are no
longer stored in the storage room. Replicated furniture and garden tools will be taken over and can be placed in the same way as before.
For furniture, use the "Replica Furniture" menu in the Door menu and the "Place Replica Furniture" menu in the Housing menu. For
garden tools, use "Replica Garden Tools" in the Door menu and "Place Replica Garden Tools" in the Housing menu. Also, some
exterior items such as fences and grounds are specific to each lot size, so they will not work on different sized lots...

255241.本当に マイタウンの家から この土地に\n引っ越ししますか？\n<yesno 2:
Are you sure you want to move from your home
in My Town to this lot?<yesno 2><break>

255242.<%sL_PC_NICK>は 新しい土地を購入し\nこの土地に 引っ越した！\n:
<%sL_PC_NICK> has purchased a new plot of land and has moved to this location! The Zoomstone for his house was automatically
rewritten to this location... The house that had been his annex is now back in the house kit.All furniture located in the annexe and all garden equipment located in My Town have been placed in temporary storage. The replica
furniture located in my other house and the replica garden tools located in my town are no longer stored in the storage room.
Replicated furniture and garden tools will be retained and can be placed in the same way as before... For furniture, use the "Replica
Furniture" menu in the Door menu and the "Place Replica Furniture" menu in the Housing menu. For garden tools: Place replica garden
tools in the door menu "Replica Garden Tools" and in the tool menu "Place Replica Garden Tools"... If you've hired a private
concierge, you'll need to go to "Concierge Settings" after you've moved to your new home and tell them where you want them to be...

255243.<%sL_PC_NICK>は 新しい土地を購入し\nこの土地に 引っ越した！\n:
<%sL_PC_NICK> has purchased a new plot of land and has moved to this location! The Zoomstone for his house is automatically
rewritten to this location... The house that stood on the previous plot of land has reverted back to House Kit.Furniture that was placed in your old house is now in a special state of evacuation, and when you build a new house, you can place it
in the "Furniture in storage" menu in the door menu... Furniture placed in another house and garden tools in My Town will be
stored in the storage room. The replica furniture that was placed in my other house and the replica garden tools that were placed
in My Town are no longer stored in the storage room. Replicated furniture and garden tools will be retained and can be placed in
the same way as before... For furniture, use the "Replica Furniture" menu in the Door menu and the "Place Replica Furniture" menu in the
Housing menu. For garden tools: Place replica garden tools in the door menu "Replica Garden Tools" and in the tool menu "Place Replica
Garden Tools"... If you've hired a private concierge, you'll need to go to "Concierge Settings" after you've moved to your new home
and tell them where you want them to be...

256918.引っ越し後の 権限設定は\nマイタウン専用に設定した 庭の権限も含めて\nマイタ:
If you're moving, your MyTown permissions will still apply to your home, including the garden permissions you set up for MyTown...
Before you move, I'd like to make sure that you're still using the same permissions... Have you checked your home settings?

257546.現在 引っ越し制限期間中のため\nマイタウンの土地へ 引っ越すことが\nできませ:
I'm currently under a move restriction period, which means I can't move to a property in my town... Please wait until
<%2dM_cal_MM> month <%2dM_cal_DD> day <%2dM_hh>: <%02dM_mm>...

257786.さかなが 床下水そうか\n別宅の水そうに いるときは\n引っ越しできません。\n:
When the fish are in the subfloor or in the water in the other house, you can't move...You can also move when you're growing a field, or when your monsters are in the garden, or when you're out for a walk, or
when you have a gift to give away...

257832.床下水そうか 別宅の水そうに さかながいます。\n水そうから すべてのさかなを出:
There's fish in the subfloor, or in the water of the other house... I'm gonna need you to take all the fish out of the pond and clean
them.

258618.土地のサイズが 引っ越し前より 小さい場合\n庭具や外装を そのまま引っ越すこと:
If your lot is smaller than it was before you moved in, you can't just move in your garden tools and exterior... If you're moving to a
smaller lot, you'll need to clear out all of your garden equipment. Also, some of the exterior features, like the fence and the
ground, are specific to the size of the lot, so they won't fit on a different lot.

258619.<%sL_PC_NICK>は 新しい土地を購入し\nこの土地に 引っ越した！\n:
<%sL_PC_NICK> has purchased a new plot of land and has moved to this location! The Zoomstones for his house are automatically
rewritten to this location...If you have a private concierge, you will need to re-position them after your move. If I have a private concierge, will I be able to
go to "Concierge Settings" after I move and tell them where I want...

258620.『更地に引っ越し』の場合 建っていた家は\n家キットに戻ります。\n<br>\n:
If you are moving to a new house, the house will be returned to the house kit... The furniture that was placed in the house before
the move is now in a special evacuation state and can be placed in the "Furniture in progress" menu in the door menu of the main
house... If you had a private concierge, after you move, you will need to go into your concierge settings and re-position...

258870.「こんにちは <%sL_PC_NICK>さま。\n マイタウンのご購入 おめでと:
Hello <%sL_PC_NICK... Congratulations on your purchase of My Town... Your move is now complete... My name is <%sL_MAID_NAME> and
I'm the administrator of Mytown... I would like to thank you for your continued support... From now on, we will help you live
your life to the fullest, and I'm sure you'll be very satisfied... You are now the proud owner of your own town... I hope you enjoy your life here!

263036.フェンスや地面などの 一部の外装は\n土地のサイズごとに 専用なので\nサイズの:
Some exteriors, like the fence and the
ground, are specific to the size of the lot,
so they won't fit on different sized lots...

263154.「こんにちは <%sL_PC_NICK>さま。\n レンダーヒルズに ようこそい:
Hello, <%sL_PC_NICK... Welcome to Render Hills... Your move is complete... My name is <%sL_MAID_NAME> and I am the administrator of
this residential village... I look forward to working with you... We will do our best to make your stay with us as comfortable as
possible. returned to the house kit...Furniture that was placed in your old house is now in a special state of evacuation and can be placed in your new house by clicking
on "Furniture in storage" in the door menu. All furniture placed in another house and garden equipment placed in My Town will be
stored in the storage room. However, the replica furniture in my other house and the replica garden tools in my town will not be
stored in the storage room and will disappear. The replica furniture and garden equipment will be retained and can be placed
in the same locations as before. If you've hired a private concierge, after you move, will you need to go to your concierge
settings and tell them where you want them to be again?Now, you, <%sL_PC_NICK>, will be living in Renderhills... I hope you enjoy your time here!

263155.「こんにちは <%sL_PC_NICK>さま。\n レンダーヒルズに ようこそい:
Hello, <%sL_PC_NICK... Welcome to Render Hills... Your move is complete... My name is <%sL_MAID_NAME> and I am the administrator of
this residential village... I look forward to working with you... We will do our best to make your stay with us as comfortable as
possible. All furniture placed in the villa and all garden tools placed in My Town will be stored in the storage closet. However, the replica
furniture in my other house and the replica garden tools in my town will not be stored in the storage room and will disappear. The
replica furniture and garden tools will be taken over and you will be able to place them as you did before. For furniture, use the
"Replica Furniture" menu in the door menu and "Place Replica Furniture" in the "Housing" menu... For garden tools: Place replica
garden tools in the door menu "Replica Garden Tools" and in the tool menu "Place Replica Garden Tools"... If you've hired a private
concierge, you'll need to go to the "Concierge Settings" menu after you've moved to your new home...Now, you, <%sL_PC_NICK>, will be living in Renderhills... I hope you enjoy your time here!
